      构造器和说明

      Create an instance using the given PrivilegedOperationExecutor instance for performing operations.
      DockerLinuxContainerRuntime(PrivilegedOperationExecutor privilegedOperationExecutor)
      Create an instance using the given PrivilegedOperationExecutor instance for performing operations.
      DockerLinuxContainerRuntime(PrivilegedOperationExecutor privilegedOperationExecutor, CGroupsHandler cGroupsHandler)
      Create an instance using the given PrivilegedOperationExecutor instance for performing operations and the given CGroupsHandler instance.
      JavaSandboxLinuxContainerRuntime(PrivilegedOperationExecutor privilegedOperationExecutor)
      Create an instance using the given PrivilegedOperationExecutor instance for performing operations.
